title: English Together
description:
`English Together` is a three stage course for children (with an optional `Starter Book` for younger beginners or those not familiar with the Roman alphabet).

`English Together` is based on the belief that children learn best by working together, playing together, exploring the new language together. It gives a lot of opportunities for children to cooperate to solve problems, express opinions, and to enjoy themselves by playing games, doing puzzles and singing together.

Pupils` Book

`Cliff Castle` has an exciting story line about a mysterious castle where the children discover a magic computer! In `Cliff Castle`, children learn to talk and write about the world around them as well as about themselves. The skills they acquired in their first year of English are developed and they are encouraged to do simple projects.

- Easy to teach, even for large classes
- Language selection is based on what is useful and natural.
- Language is integrated and re-woven so that there is constant revision built in.
- Contains a wide variety of practice activities, songs, rhymes and games.
- Cross-curricular teaching, with Factfiles about topics such as space travel, animals and Hollywood.
